ygData.subject: staff of observers
ygData.msgSnippet: Where did everyone go?  hehe.  Is there another Wizard list more active than this one?  :) Anyway, taking my time trying to solve quests lately so my
ygData.messageBody:
Where did everyone go? hehe. Is there another Wizard list more active than
this one? :)

Anyway, taking my time trying to solve quests lately so my power-leveling
brethren are passing me by (again...on their second characters hehe) . Got
the Staff of Observers yesterday which is pretty cool. How do we get the
Sentinel spell to work on the staff...we just right-click on the staff
before medding? To bad I really don't have a need for this staff right
now...Staff of Writhing and Stein of Mogguk is better for me. But I wanna
play around with it before I use it for trade or something. :)

--Lim'Dul
